Key Match Events: England defeated Sri Lanka by 4 wickets to enter the semi-finals of T20 World Cup
Pathum Nissanka hit a gutsy half-century (67 off 45) for Sri Lanka
Mark Wood's 3 for 26 helped England restrict Sri Lanka to 141 for 8
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Sydney Cricket Ground (SCG)
Others: Jos Buttler scored 47 off 30 for England
Ben Stokes scored 42 off 36 for England
Adil Rashid was the Player of the Match
